title: Digital Game-Based Elementary Mathematics Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Arithmetic Operations and Mathematical Concept Comprehension
context.additional_context: Reduces math anxiety and improves engagement through personalized digital device use and game-based learning.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce anxiety by 20% when solving math problems in a DGBL (Digital Game-Based Learning) environment.
Learners accurately solve fraction/decimal operation problems with 85% or higher precision through in-game missions.
Learners identify three or more error patterns through learning log analysis and establish improvement plans.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
